Title: Requires businesses to pay holiday premium pay on certain federal holidays
Summary: Relates to requiring employers to pay holiday premium pay to certain employees on certain federal holidays including New Year's Day, Labor Day, Memorial Day and Independence Day.
LawCode: Amd ยง190, add ยง191-d, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring employers to pay holiday premium pay to certain employees on certain federal holidays
